name: Train Simulator 2021: BR Sectors Class 56 Loco
summary: The heavy freight second generation Class 56 diesel locomotive comes to Train Simulator 2021 in BR Sectors livery. Built for British Rail between 1976 and 1984, the first batch of 30 locomotives were built by Electroputere in Romania as a replacement to aging fleets of first generation locomotives such as the Class 37 and Class 47.
